title: This is the United Nations
creator_credit: Edward Magruder Jones, Gilbert Lauzun, United Nations Films and Elspeth MacDougall
brief_description: Describes the basic structure and major functions of the United Nations. Each organ of the United Nations is introduced by graphics before film coverage with commentary.
